## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-18
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-18 - Get All Applicable Levels List.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of all applicable levels (paginated, filterable).

## Request/Response
- **Request:** PageNumber, PageSize, IsActive, SearchTerm
- **Response:** Items (array)

## User Roles
- Master Admin
- Practice Admin
- Tech Team Panel Member
- TA Team Admin
